text: Whether or not they’re in heels hours after giving birth, all moms deserve to be celebrated. The Middleton sisters will have their hands full this Mother’s Day, with Kate and William welcoming baby Louis into their royal household while Pippa and her husband, James Matthews, await the arrival of their first child in October. If you’re still looking for a gift that screams “you’re a queen, mom,” it might be time to browse these Middleton-approved go-tos. We collected some of Kate and Pippa’s favorite products, which could give the mother in your life the royal pampering she deserves.
title: 8 Kate and Pippa Middleton-Inspired Mother’s Day Gifts
